name: Satellite Madness
description:
Collect satellites to become stronger, try to stay together, because together you are stronger, the satellites are slower than you and they can destroy enemy bullets or be used as a human shield , one hit and you lose!

    Press and hold the space bar to move in slow motion, you will aim and dodge better.

MUSIC BY OBLIDIVM http://oblidivmmusic.blogspot.com.es/
